data.lyric:
[ti:Going Bad (Explicit)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Drake]
[al:Championships (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Going Bad (Explicit) - Meek Mill (米克·米尔)/Drake (德雷克)
[00:03.72]Drake/Future：
[00:04.00]Yeah
[00:05.62]Wheezy outta here
[00:07.74]Jeez jeez
[00:08.65]
[00:10.52]Drake：
[00:11.61]Back home smokin' legal
[00:13.66]Legal
[00:14.28]I got more slaps than The Beatles
[00:16.56]Beatles
[00:17.15]Foreign s**t runnin' on diesel dawg
[00:19.67]Playin' with my name that s**t is lethal dawg
[00:22.50]Who you say you was
[00:23.39]Don Corleone
[00:24.62]
[00:25.49]Trust me at the top it isn't lonely
[00:27.31]Strapped
[00:28.12]Everybody actin' like they know me dawg
[00:30.80]Don't just say you're down you gotta show me
[00:32.96]What you gotta do
[00:34.11]Bring the clip back empty
[00:35.41]It's empty
[00:36.43]You asked to see the boss so they sent me dawg
[00:38.79]Sent me dawg
[00:39.31]I just broke her off with a 10-piece dawg
[00:41.74]10-piece dawg
[00:42.49]That ain't nothin' I'm just bein' friendly dawg
[00:45.17]Drake：
[00:45.34]It's just a lil' 10-piece for her
[00:47.33]Just to blow it in the mall doesn't mean that we're involved
[00:50.16]I just what I just uh put a Richard on the card
[00:52.92]I ain't grow up playin' ball but
[00:54.63]I'll show you how the f**k you gotta do it
[00:56.83]If you really wanna ball 'til you fall
[00:58.60]When your back against the wall
[00:59.88]And a bunch of n***as need you to go away
[01:03.05]Still goin' bad on 'em anyway
[01:05.81]Saw you last night but did it broad day
[01:07.89]Drake：
[01:08.03]Yeah lot of Murakami in the hallway
[01:10.57]What
[01:10.75]Got a sticky and I keep it at my dawg's place
[01:13.81]Girl I left your love at Magic now it's all shade
[01:17.06]Still goin' bad on you anyway
[01:18.97]Meek Mill：
[01:19.26]Woah woah ooh woah
[01:21.46]Woah woah ah
[01:23.47]I could fit like 80 racks in my Amiris
[01:26.22]80 racks
[01:26.74]Me and Drizzy back-to-back it's gettin' scary
[01:28.62]Back-to-back
[01:29.38]If you f**kin' with my opps just don't come near me
[01:31.45]Get outta my way
[01:32.15]Put some bands all on your head like Jason Terry
[01:33.99]Brrt brrt ooh
[01:35.34]Richard Mille cost a Lambo
[01:36.87]That's a Lambo
[01:37.77]Known to keep the baddest B*****s on commando
[01:39.88]Salute
[01:40.32]Every time I'm in my trap I move like Rambo
[01:42.89]Extended
[01:43.04]Ain't a neighborhood in Philly that I can't go
[01:45.37]That's a Fendi
[01:45.99]For real
[01:47.13]She said Oh you rich rich
[01:48.18]You rich rich
[01:49.07]B***h I graduated call me
[01:50.39]Big Fish
[01:51.38]Marlin
[01:51.99]I got Lori Harvey on my wish list
[01:53.87]That's Lori
[01:54.70]That's the only thing I want for Christmas
[01:56.62]True story uh
[01:57.97]I've been had my way out here yeah know that's facts
[02:00.58]Facts
[02:01.12]You ain't livin' that s**t you say yeah we know that's cap
[02:03.33]That's cap
[02:03.82]You ain't got to ask me when you see me know I'm strapped
[02:05.84]Brrt
[02:06.64]DC OVO we back again we goin' plat'
[02:08.84]Ooh ooh
[02:09.18]Drake：
[02:09.33]It's just a lil' 10-piece for her
[02:11.18]Just to blow it in the mall doesn't mean that we're involved
[02:13.68]I just what I just uh put a Richard on the card
[02:16.65]I ain't grow up playin' ball but
[02:18.40]I'll show you how the f**k you gotta do it
[02:20.53]If you really wanna ball 'til you fall
[02:22.28]When your back against the wall
[02:23.67]And a bunch of n***as need you to go away
[02:26.68]Still goin' bad on 'em anyway
[02:29.48]Saw you last night but did it broad day
[02:41.52]Future：
[02:41.69]Wheezy outta here
data.trans:
[ti:Going Bad (Explicit)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Drake]
[al:Championships (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.72]//
[00:04.00]//
[00:05.62]Wheezy制作
[00:07.74]哎呀 天哪
[00:08.65]
[00:10.52]//
[00:11.61]在我的家乡 抽**是合法的
[00:13.66]合法的
[00:14.28]我的热歌比甲壳虫乐队都多
[00:16.56]甲壳虫乐队
[00:17.15]进口车烧的是柴油 兄弟
[00:19.67]敢拿我的名字开玩笑 小心小命不保
[00:22.50]你说你是谁来着
[00:23.39]教父柯里昂
[00:24.62]
[00:25.49]相信我 无敌并不寂寞
[00:27.31]随身带枪
[00:28.12]每个人都装作认识我
[00:30.80]不要空口说大话 证明给我看啊
[00:32.96]你想怎么做
[00:34.11]子弹一梭子全打光
[00:35.41]弹夹空空
[00:36.43]你想见老大 于是他们派我来了 兄弟
[00:38.79]派我来了 兄弟
[00:39.31]我刚用一万块把那个女人打发了 兄弟
[00:41.74]一万块 兄弟
[00:42.49]这没什么 我只是跟她客气客气
[00:45.17]//
[00:45.34]仅仅是一万块而已
[00:47.33]不过是一起逛了逛商场 不代表我们有什么关系
[00:50.16]我刚刚 什么 我刚刚 买了一块理查德·米勒手表
[00:52.92]我不是从小就这么有钱 但是
[00:54.63]让我来教教你怎么发财吧
[00:56.83]如果你真的想要腰缠万贯
[00:58.60]那么 当你无路可退
[00:59.88]还有很多人想让你放弃的时候
[01:03.05]你依然要挺起胸膛 坚持下去
[01:05.81]我昨晚看见你了 我走到今天从没耍阴招
[01:07.89]//
[01:08.03]走廊墙壁上挂满了村上隆的作品
[01:10.57]什么
[01:10.75]搞了点货 我把它放在我兄弟那里
[01:13.81]姑娘 我已经不稀罕你的爱了 太卑鄙
[01:17.06]但我还是会享受你的肉体
[01:18.97]//
[01:19.26]//
[01:21.46]//
[01:23.47]我可以往我的Amiri牛仔裤里塞进八万块
[01:26.22]八万块
[01:26.74]我和Drake通力合作 可以吓死你们
[01:28.62]通力合作
[01:29.38]如果你跟我对手是一伙的 那就别靠近我
[01:31.45]给我滚远点
[01:32.15]花几千块找个杀手 取你项上人头
[01:33.99]//
[01:35.34]理查德·米勒手表的价格和一辆兰博基尼差不多
[01:36.87]那可是兰博基尼呢
[01:37.77]大家都知道 我身边随时都有漂亮妞
[01:39.88]敬礼
[01:40.32]在我的地盘 我就像《第一滴血》里的兰博一样无人可挡
[01:42.89]横行霸道
[01:43.04]整个费城 没有哪个地方不欢迎我
[01:45.37]这是事实
[01:45.99]真的
[01:47.13]她说 哦 你很有钱吗
[01:48.18]你很有钱啊
[01:49.07]小妞 我长大了 快改口
[01:50.39]叫我“大鱼”
[01:51.38]枪鱼
[01:51.99]我把Lori Harvey加入了我的愿望清单
[01:53.87]我说的是Lori
[01:54.70]我只想要她做我的圣诞礼物
[01:56.62]这是真的
[01:57.97]我摸爬滚打这么久 终于走到这一步 这是事实
[02:00.58]事实
[02:01.12]你总是说得到 做不到 我们知道你的话都是唬人的
[02:03.33]唬人的
[02:03.82]见到我的时候躲远点 我身上带着家伙呢
[02:05.84]//
[02:06.64]我的Dreamchasers和Drake的OVO Sound 我们雄风再起 定会拿下白金专辑
[02:08.84]//
[02:09.18]//
[02:09.33]仅仅是一万块而已
[02:11.18]不过是一起逛了逛商场 不代表我们有什么关系
[02:13.68]我刚刚 什么 我刚刚 买了一块理查德·米勒手表
[02:16.65]我不是从小就这么有钱 但是
[02:18.40]让我来教教你怎么发财吧
[02:20.53]如果你真的想要腰缠万贯
[02:22.28]那么 当你无路可退
[02:23.67]还有很多人想让你放弃的时候
[02:26.68]你依然要挺起胸膛 坚持下去
[02:29.48]我昨晚看见你了 我走到今天从没耍阴招
[02:41.52]//
[02:41.69]Wheezy制作
